attributes.action: make asthma medication free on the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to concider making asthma medication for long term sufferers free on the NHS.
people who are obese can claim surgery on the NHS which tax payers must contribute,surgery which is needed because the fault of the patient.
 I am an asthma sufferer and it is no fault of my own so why should i and people like myself have to pay for our life saving medication?

i and may others feel it is unfair and like this matter to be brought up in government.

rejection.details: See: Treat Asthmatics the same as those with Diabetes - FREE PRESCRIPTIONS!
